key_risks: Economic volatility in Turkey, including high inflation and currency depreciation
Intense competition from other private and digital-only banks
Reputation and operational risks related to data security and customer privacy
controversies: Involvement in lawsuits abroad with potential financial liabilities
Regulatory challenges and potential changes in oversight
environmental_issues: Commitment to sustainable finance and green loans, but exposure to environmental risks in Turkey
social_issues: Data security and customer privacy concerns
Ethical banking practices and customer trust
governance_issues: Regulatory compliance and oversight by Turkey’s Banking Regulation and Supervision Agency (BRSA)
Majority ownership by BBVA and potential influence on governance
